mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (id, password, email, name, nickname, phone_number, birthdate, kakao_id, seq, is_online, sign_up_type) VALUES(#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone_number}, #{birthdate}, #{kakao_id}, #{seq}, #{is_online}, #{sign_up_type})
